name: @fschopp/graphviz-for-you-track
description: Graphviz for YouTrack. Visualizes both parent-child and dependency relationships of the issues in a YouTrack saved search.
author: Florian Schoppmann <mail@florian-schoppmann.net> (https://florian-schoppmann.net)

scripts.compile: tsc && tsc -p src/scripts/ && node target/scripts/surplus-compiler.js target/main/*.jsx
scripts.run: mkdir -p target/run && cp node_modules/viz.js/full.render.js target/run && parcel serve --cache-dir target/parcel-cache --out-dir target/run --public-url /graphviz-for-you-track/ src/html/index.html
scripts.site: mkdir -p target/site && cp node_modules/viz.js/full.render.js target/site && parcel build --cache-dir target/parcel-cache --out-dir target/site --public-url /graphviz-for-you-track/ src/html/index.html
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test:coverage && npm run compile && npm run doc && npm run site && src/scripts/gh_pages.sh
